mapper.sql: id as id , surplus_fee as surplusFee , total_fee as totalFee , order_owner as orderOwner , agency as agency , type as type , status as status , create_dt as createDt , update_dt as updateDt , create_by as createBy , update_by as updateBy , order_no as orderNo , parent_order as parentOrder , parent_order_list as parentOrderList , trade_type as tradeType , trade_identify as tradeIdentify , editor as editor , des as des , editor_name as editorName , user_roles as userRoles
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( surplus_fee, total_fee, order_owner, agency, type, status, create_dt, update_dt, create_by, update_by, order_no, parent_order, parent_order_list, trade_type, trade_identify, editor, des, editor_name, user_roles ) VALUES ( #{surplusFee}, #{totalFee}, #{orderOwner}, #{agency}, #{type}, #{status}, #{createDt}, #{updateDt}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{orderNo}, #{parentOrder}, #{parentOrderList}, #{tradeType}, #{tradeIdentify}, #{editor}, #{des}, #{editorName}, #{userRoles} )

INSERT INTO orders ( surplus_fee, total_fee, order_owner, agency, type, status, create_dt, update_dt, create_by, update_by, order_no, parent_order, parent_order_list, trade_type, trade_identify, editor, des, editor_name, user_roles ) VALUES ( #{map.surplusFee}, #{map.totalFee}, #{map.orderOwner}, #{map.agency}, #{map.type}, #{map.status}, #{map.createDt}, #{map.updateDt}, #{map.createBy}, #{map.updateBy}, #{map.orderNo}, #{map.parentOrder}, #{map.parentOrderList}, #{map.tradeType}, #{map.tradeIdentify}, #{map.editor}, #{map.des}, #{map.editorName}, #{map.userRoles} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE orders
surplus_fee = #{surplusFee},
total_fee = #{totalFee},
order_owner = #{orderOwner},
agency = #{agency},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
create_dt = #{createDt},
update_dt = #{updateDt},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
order_no = #{orderNo},
parent_order = #{parentOrder},
parent_order_list = #{parentOrderList},
trade_type = #{tradeType},
trade_identify = #{tradeIdentify},
editor = #{editor},
des = #{des},
editor_name = #{editorName},
user_roles = #{userRoles},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE orders
surplus_fee = #{map.surplusFee},
total_fee = #{map.totalFee},
order_owner = #{map.orderOwner},
agency = #{map.agency},
type = #{map.type},
status = #{map.status},
create_dt = #{map.createDt},
update_dt = #{map.updateDt},
create_by = #{map.createBy},
update_by = #{map.updateBy},
order_no = #{map.orderNo},
parent_order = #{map.parentOrder},
parent_order_list = #{map.parentOrderList},
trade_type = #{map.tradeType},
trade_identify = #{map.tradeIdentify},
editor = #{map.editor},
des = #{map.des},
editor_name = #{map.editorName},
user_roles = #{map.userRoles},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE orders
surplus_fee = #{update.surplusFee},
total_fee = #{update.totalFee},
order_owner = #{update.orderOwner},
agency = #{update.agency},
type = #{update.type},
status = #{update.status},
create_dt = #{update.createDt},
update_dt = #{update.updateDt},
create_by = #{update.createBy},
update_by = #{update.updateBy},
order_no = #{update.orderNo},
parent_order = #{update.parentOrder},
parent_order_list = #{update.parentOrderList},
trade_type = #{update.tradeType},
trade_identify = #{update.tradeIdentify},
editor = #{update.editor},
des = #{update.des},
editor_name = #{update.editorName},
user_roles = #{update.userRoles},
${nativeSql}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, surplus_fee
, total_fee
, order_owner
, agency
, type
, status
, create_dt
, update_dt
, create_by
, update_by
, order_no
, parent_order
, parent_order_list
, trade_type
, trade_identify
, editor
, des
, editor_name
, user_roles
FROM orders
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1
